# TimeSpanExtensions class

Static class than contains extension methods for objects of type TimeSpan.

```csharp
public static class TimeSpanExtensions
```

## Public Members

| name | description |
| --- | --- |
| static [ToShortFormat](TimeSpanExtensions/ToShortFormat.md)(…) | Converts a TimeSpan object into dd'd' HH'h' MM'm' ss's' or HH'h' MM'm' ss's' or MM'm' ss's' string. |
| static [TotalTime](TimeSpanExtensions/TotalTime.md)(…) | Returns total time. |
